definition: next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: This function solves a standard quadratic equation .
sentences.chinese: 这个函数求解一个标准的二次方程。

sentences.english: The expression of the long-term optical-beam spreading radius is obtained by a quadratic approximation.
sentences.chinese: 通过二次方近似得到了长期光束扩展半径表达式。

sentences.english: You can be solving quadratic equations at the same time if you like.
sentences.chinese: 如果你喜欢的话，你可以一边穿鞋一边解二次方程。

sentences.english: Most quadratic equations have two different solutions.
sentences.chinese: 大部分二次方程式都有两个不同的解。

sentences.english: Given a response surface equation in quadratic form, the Six Sigma.
sentences.chinese: 给出一个二次方程式形式的响应曲面公式。

sentences.english: The quadratic equation may have instilled horror in many of us.
sentences.chinese: 对很多人来说，二次方程是很恐怖的。

sentences.english: The merit and defect of Newton method for the quadratic matrix equation were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了牛顿法解二次方程的优点和缺点。

sentences.english: Some quadratic equations have no real roots .
sentences.chinese: 某些二次方程没有实数根。

sentences.english: Quadratic Equation Solving Function - This function solves a standard quadratic equation .
sentences.chinese: 这个函数求解一个标准的二次方程。

sentences.english: The chain termination is second order with respect to the concentration of active species.
sentences.chinese: 链终止反应速度与活性中心浓度的二次方成正比。

sentences.english: The relation between the cumulative release amount of cadmium with the leaching amount could be described with mono basic quadratic equation.
sentences.chinese: 镉累积释放量与淋溶量的关系可用一元二次方程描述。

definition: a nonnegative number (i.e. positive or zero)
surd (math.)/algebraic expression involving a square root or other irrationality
